form.longName: PhenX PX070701 - Personal Perception and Knowledge of Smoking-related Cancer Risk
form.preferredDefinition: These questions ask current and former smokers how often they worry about lung cancer and ask them to assess their perception of being diagnosed with lung cancer.

module.longName: Personal Perception and Knowledge of Smoking-related Cancer Risk
module.preferredDefinition: Personal Perception And Knowledge Of Smokingrelated Can

question.questionText: How often do you worry about getting lung cancer? Would you say: (lung_cancer_worry)
Compared to others your age who currently smoke, what do you think are your chances of being diagnosed with lung cancer during your lifetime? Are you: (lung_cancer_risk_assessment)

protocol.longName: Personal Perception and Knowledge of Smoking-related Cancer Risk
protocol.preferredDefinition: These questions ask current and former smokers how often they worry about lung cancer and ask them to assess their perception of being diagnosed with lung cancer.

form.longName: PhenX PX070801 - Preexisting Conditions Associated With Cancer
form.preferredDefinition: This self-administered protocol asks respondents to indicate the year of diagnosis for clinician-diagnosed illnesses. The respondent is also asked to provide the year of first diagnosis.

question.questionText: Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Myocardial infarction (heart attack)? (myocardial_infarction_heart_attack_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Myocardial infarction (heart attack)? (myocardial_infarction_heart_attack_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Angina pectoris? (angina_pectoris_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Angina pectoris? (angina_pectoris_year)
Confirmed angiography? (angina_pectoris_confirmed_angiography)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Coronary bypass, angioplasty, or stent? (coronary_bypass_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Coronary bypass, angioplasty, or stent? (coronary_bypass_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Transient ischemic attack (TIA)? (transient_ischemic_attack_tia_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Transient ischemic attack (TIA)? (transient_ischemic_attack_tia_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Stroke (CVA)? (stroke_cva_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Stroke (CVA)? (stroke_cva_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Deep vein thrombosis/Pulmonary embolism? (dvt_thrombosis_pe_embolism_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Deep vein thrombosis/Pulmonary embolism? (dvt_thrombosis_pe_embolism_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Melanoma? (melanoma_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Melanoma? (melanoma_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Basal cell skin cancer? (basal_cell_skin_cancer_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Basal cell skin cancer? (basal_cell_skin_cancer_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Squamous cell skin cancer? (squamous_cell_skin_cancer_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Squamous cell skin cancer? (squamous_cell_skin_cancer_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Fibrocystic/other benign breast disease? (fibrocystic_benign_breast_disease_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Fibrocystic/other benign breast disease? (fibrocystic_benign_breast_disease_year)
Confirmed by breast biopsy? (fibrocystic_benign_breast_confirmed_biopsy)
Confirmed by aspiration? (fibrocystic_benign_breast_confirmed_aspiration)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Breast cancer? (breast_cancer_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Breast cancer? (breast_cancer_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Other cancer? (other_cancer_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Other cancer? (other_cancer_year)
Specify site of other cancer. (other_cancer_site)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Colon or rectal polyp (benign)? (colon_rectal_polyp_benign_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Colon or rectal polyp (benign)? (colon_rectal_polyp_benign_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Ulcerative colitis/Crohn's? (ulcerative_colitis_crohns_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Ulcerative colitis/Crohn's? (ulcerative_colitis_crohns_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Gastric or duodenal ulcer? (gastric_duodenal_ulcer_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Gastric or duodenal ulcer? (gastric_duodenal_ulcer_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Barrett's Esophagus? (barretts_esophagus_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Barrett's Esophagus? (barretts_esophagus_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Gallstones? (gallstones_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Gallstones? (gallstones_year)
Did you have symptoms? (gallstones_symptoms)
How diagnosed? (gallstones_diagnosed)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Cholecystectomy? (cholecystectomy_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Cholecystectomy? (cholecystectomy_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Diabetes mellitus? (diabetes_mellitus_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Diabetes mellitus? (diabetes_mellitus_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Elevated cholesterol? (elevated_cholesterol_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Elevated cholesterol? (elevated_cholesterol_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? High blood pressure? (high_blood_pressure_hbp_history)
Year of Diagnosis, High blood pressure? (high_blood_pressure_hbp_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Endometriosis1st diagnosis? (endometriosis_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Endometriosis1st diagnosis? (endometriosis_year)
Confirmed by laparoscopy? (endometriosis_confirmed_laparoscopy)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Uterine fibroids1st diagnosis? (uterine_fibroids_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Uterine fibroids1st diagnosis? (uterine_fibroids_year)
Confirmed by pelvic exam? (uterine_fibroids_confirmed_pelvic_exam)
Confirmed by ultrasound/hysterectomy? (uterine_fibroids_confirmed_ultrasound_hysterectomy)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Premenstrual syndrome (PMS)? (premenstrual_syndrome_pms_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Premenstrual syndrome (PMS)? (premenstrual_syndrome_pms_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Kidney stones? (kidney_stones_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Kidney stones? (kidney_stones_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Multiple Sclerosis? (multiple_sclerosis_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Multiple Sclerosis? (multiple_sclerosis_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Asthma, doctor diagnosed? (asthma_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Asthma, doctor diagnosed? (asthma_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Emphysema/Chronic Bronchitis, doctor diagnosis? (emphysema_chronic_bronchitis_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Emphysema/Chronic Bronchitis, doctor diagnosis? (emphysema_chronic_bronchitis_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Pneumonia, xray confirmed? (pneumonia_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Pneumonia, xray confirmed? (pneumonia_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Graves' Disease/Hyperthyroidism (graves_disease_hyperthyroidism_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Graves' Disease/Hyperthyroidism (graves_disease_hyperthyroidism_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Hypothyroidism? (hypothyroidism_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Hypothyroidism? (hypothyroidism_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Thyroid nodule (benign)? (thyroid_nodule_benign_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Thyroid nodule (benign)? (thyroid_nodule_benign_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Gout? (gout_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Gout? (gout_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? SLE (systemic lupus)? (sle_systemic_lupus_history)
Year of Diagnosis, SLE (systemic lupus)? (sle_systemic_lupus_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Rheumatoid arthritis, doctor diagnosis? (rheumatoid_arthritis_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Rheumatoid arthritis, doctor diagnosis? (rheumatoid_arthritis_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Other arthritis? (other_arthritis_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Other arthritis? (other_arthritis_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Depression, clinician diagnosis? (depression_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Depression, clinician diagnosis? (depression_year)
Have you had any of these cliniciandiagnosed illnesses? Other major illness or surgery? (other_major_illness_surgery_history)
Year of Diagnosis, Other major illness or surgery? (other_major_illness_surgery_year)
Please specify Date (Other major illness or surgery). (other_major_illness_surgery_date)

protocol.preferredDefinition: This self-administered protocol asks respondents to indicate the year of diagnosis for clinician-diagnosed illnesses. The respondent is also asked to provide the year of first diagnosis.

form.preferredDefinition: These self-administered questions ask about different cancer screening tests a respondent may have had in the past 3 years. The protocol includes the following screenings: mammogram, pap smear, pelvic examination, Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) test, colonoscopy, ultrasound of the ovaries, barium enema, chest x-ray, sigmoidoscopy, and digital rectal examination.

question.questionText: During the past three years, have you had a chest xray? (chest_x_ray)
During the past three years, have you had a test for blood in the stool? (blood_stool)
During the past three years, have you had a colonoscopy, sigmoidoscopy, or barium enema to examine the colon and rectum? (colonoscopy_sigmoidoscopy_barium_enema)
During the past three years, have you had a mammogram? (mammogram)
During the past three years, have you had a pap smear? (pap_smear)
During the past three years, have you had a pelvic examination? (pelvic_examination)
During the past three years, have you had an ultrasound or scan of your ovaries? (ovary_ultrasound_scan)
During the past three years, have you had a blood test for ovarian cancer, for example, CA125? (ovarian_cancer_blood_test_ca125)
During the past three years, have you had a digital rectal examination of the prostate? (digital_rectal_examination_prostate)
During the past three years, have you had a blood test for prostate cancer, for example, PSA? (prostate_cancer_blood_test_psa)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These self-administered questions ask about different cancer screening tests a respondent may have had in the past 3 years. The protocol includes the following screenings: mammogram, pap smear, pelvic examination, Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA) test, colonoscopy, ultrasound of the ovaries, barium enema, chest x-ray, sigmoidoscopy, and digital rectal examination.

form.preferredDefinition: These self-administered questions ask current and former smokers about their intention to quit smoking, details of past attempts to quit, and whether a health care professional advised the respondent to quit smoking.

question.questionText: Are you considering quitting smoking during the next 6 months? (quit_smoking_consider)

validValue.meaningText: Yes, plan to stop within next 30 days
validValue.description: Yes, plan to stop within next 30 days

validValue.meaningText: Yes, plan to stop within next 6 months, but not within next 30 days
validValue.description: Yes, plan to stop within next 6 months, but not within next 30 days

validValue.meaningText: No, not thinking of quitting in next 6 months
validValue.description: No, not thinking of quitting in next 6 months

question.questionText: In the past, have you ever made a serious attempt to quit smoking? That is, have you stopped smoking for at least one day or longer because you were trying to quit? (quit_smoking_attempt)
What was the longest length of time you stopped smoking because you were trying to quit? (quit_smoking_longest_time)
How old were you when you most recently quit smoking? (quit_smoking_age)
Thinking of the most recent time you quit smoking, did you use any of the following products? Nicotine gum: (quit_smoking_product_nicotine_gum)
Thinking of the most recent time you quit smoking, did you use any of the following products? Nicotine patch: (quit_smoking_product_nicotine_patch)
Thinking of the most recent time you quit smoking, did you use any of the following products? Nicotine nasal spray, inhaler, lozenge, or tablet: (quit_smoking_product_nicotine_other)
Thinking of the most recent time you quit smoking, did you use any of the following products? Prescription pill such as Zyban, Buproprion, or Wellbutrin: (quit_smoking_product_prescription_pill)
Thinking of the most recent time you quit smoking, did you use any of the following products? None of these: (quit_smoking_product_none)
During the past 12 months, did any doctor, dentist, nurse, or any other health professional advise you to quit smoking? (quit_smoking_professional_advise)

validValue.meaningText: No, was not advised to quit
validValue.description: No, was not advised to quit

validValue.meaningText: No, did not see a health professional in past 12 months
validValue.description: No, did not see a health professional in past 12 months

validValue.meaningText: No, did not smoke in past 12 months
validValue.description: No, did not smoke in past 12 months

protocol.preferredDefinition: These self-administered questions ask current and former smokers about their intention to quit smoking, details of past attempts to quit, and whether a health care professional advised the respondent to quit smoking.

form.longName: PhenX PX071201 - Medications (Current and Past Use of Pain Relievers, Statins, and Steroids)
form.preferredDefinition: This measure assesses current and past use of prescription and over-the-counter (OTC) medications. Protocol obtains information about pain-relieving medications, statins, steroids, and inhaled bronchodilators.

module.longName: Medications (Current and Past Use of Pain Relievers, Statins, and Steroids)
module.preferredDefinition: Medications (Current and Past Use of Pain Relievers, Statins, and Steroids)

question.questionText: Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? "Baby" or lowdose aspirin. (baby_low_aspirin_regular)
Total tablets per week? "Baby" or lowdose aspirin. (baby_low_aspirin_tablets_quantity)
Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? Aspirin or aspirincontaining product (Bayer, Bufferin, Excedrin). (aspirin_regular)
Total tablets per week? Aspirin or aspirincontaining product (Bayer, Bufferin, Excedrin). (aspirin_tablets_quantity)
Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? Ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin). (ibuprofen_regular)
Total tablets per week? Ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin). (ibuprofen_tablets_quantity)

Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? Naproxen, ketoprofen or other nonsteroidal (Aleve, Feldene, Indocin, Naprosyn, Orudis, Relafen). (naproxen_ketoprofen_regular)
Total tablets per week? Naproxen, ketoprofen or other nonsteroidal (Aleve, Feldene, Indocin, Naprosyn, Orudis, Relafen). (naproxen_ketoprofen_tablets_quantity)
Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? Cox2 inhibitor (Celebrex, Vioxx). (cox2_inhibitor_regular)
Total tablets per week? Cox2 inhibitor (Celebrex, Vioxx). (cox2_inhibitor_tablets_quantity)
Do you currently take any of the following painrelieving medications regularly (at least once a week)? Acetaminophen (Aspirinfree Excedrin, Tylenol, Tempra). (acetaminophen_regular)
Total tablets per week? Acetaminophen (Aspirinfree Excedrin, Tylenol, Tempra). (acetaminophen_tablets_quantity)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? "Baby" or lowdose aspirin. (baby_low_aspirin_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? "Baby" or lowdose aspirin. (baby_low_aspirin_stop_reason)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? Aspirin or aspirincontaining product. (aspirin_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? Aspirin or aspirincontaining product. (aspirin_stop_reason)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? Ibuprofen. (ibuprofen_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? Ibuprofen. (ibuprofen_stop_reason)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? Naproxen, ketoprofen, or other nonsteroidal. (naproxen_ketoprofen_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? Naproxen, ketoprofen, or other nonsteroidal. (naproxen_ketoprofen_stop_reason)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? Cox2 inhibitor. (cox2_inhibitor_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? Cox2 inhibitor. (cox2_inhibitor_stop_reason)
Did you stop the regular use of any of the following medications during the past 3 years? Acetaminophen. (acetaminophen_stop)

validValue.meaningText: Never took regularly or did not stop use
validValue.description: Never took regularly or did not stop use

question.questionText: Why did you stop regular use? Acetaminophen. (acetaminophen_stop_reason)

In the past 3 years, please indicate if you have taken either of the following types of medications. Statin medications such as lovastatin (Mevacor), atorvastatin (Lipitor), rosuvastain (Crestor), pravastatin (Pravachol), simvastatin (Zocor), fluvastatin (Lescol) (statin)

validValue.meaningText: Yes, regularly (daily for at least 2 months)
validValue.description: Yes, regularly (daily for at least 2 months)

question.questionText: In the past 3 years, please indicate if you have taken either of the following types of medications. Steroid medication in pill form such as prednisone, dexamethasone (Decadron), solumedrol (Medrol dosepack) (steroid_pill)

validValue.meaningText: Yes, regularly (daily for at least 2 months)
validValue.description: Yes, regularly (daily for at least 2 months)

protocol.longName: Medications (Current and Past Use of Pain Relievers, Statins, and Steroids)
protocol.preferredDefinition: This measure assesses current and past use of prescription and over-the-counter (OTC) medications. Protocol obtains information about pain-relieving medications, statins, steroids, and inhaled bronchodilators.

form.longName: PhenX PX070101 - Cumulative Lifetime Alcohol Exposure
form.preferredDefinition: These interviewer-administered questions ask about drinking alcohol at least once a week for 6 months or more. This question is asked for different age ranges, reflecting alcohol consumption during different periods of life.

headerInstruction.text: We would like to know about what kinds of alcohol and how much you drank at different times in your life.

question.questionText: Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages, such as beer, wine, or liquor at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_ever)
When you were Under 20 years of age, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_under_20)
For how many years? (drinking_years_under_20)
How many drinks per day (did/do) you usually have when you were Under 20 years of age? (drinking_daily_quantity_under_20)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were Under 20 years of age? (drinking_weekly_quantity_under_20)
When you were 20-29 years of age, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_twenties)
For how many years? (drinking_years_twenties)
How many drinks per day(did/do) you usually have when you were 20-29 years of age? (drinking_daily_quantity_twenties)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were 20-29 years of age? (drinking_weekly_quantity_twenties)
When you were 30-39 years of age, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_thirties)
For how many years? (drinking_years_thirties)
How many drinks per day (did/do) you usually have when you were 30-39 years of age? (drinking_daily_quantity_thirties)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were 30-39 years of age? (drinking_weekly_quantity_thirties)
When you were 40-49 years of age, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_forties)
For how many years? (drinking_years_forties)
How many drinks per day (did/do) you usually have when you were 40-49 years of age? (drinking_daily_quantity_forties)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were 40-49 years of age? (drinking_weekly_quantity_forties)
When you were 50-59 years of age, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_fifties)
For how many years? (drinking_years_fifties)
How many drinks per day (did/do) you usually have when you were 50-59 years of age? (drinking_daily_quantity_fifties)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were 50-59 years of age? (drinking_weekly_quantity_fifties)
When you were Age 60 or older, did you drink alcoholic beverages at least once a week for 6 months or more? (drinking_sixties)
For how many years? (drinking_years_sixties)
How many drinks per day (did/do) you usually have when you were Age 60 or older? (drinking_daily_quantity_sixties)
How many drinks per week (did/do) you usually have when you were Age 60 or older? (drinking_weekly_quantity_sixties)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These interviewer-administered questions ask about drinking alcohol at least once a week for 6 months or more. This question is asked for different age ranges, reflecting alcohol consumption during different periods of life.

form.preferredDefinition: These questions start by asking if the respondent has had cancer. For respondents who have had cancer, detailed follow-up questions ask about the type of cancer treatment, including surgery, chemotherapy, radiation, and hormone therapy.

question.questionText: Have you ever had cancer? (had_cancer)
Cancer Site/Type: (Example: Breast Cancer) (cancer_site)
Laterality: (cancer_laterality)
Date of Diagnosis: (cancer_diagnosis_date)
Age of Diagnosis: (cancer_diagnosis_age)
Did you have Surgery for this Cancer: (cancer_surgery)
Name of Procedure: (Example: Radical mastectomy [left]) (cancer_surgery_name)
Surgery Date: (cancer_surgery_date)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_surgery_hospital)
Did you receive Chemotherapy for this Cancer? (cancer_chemotherapy)
Type of Chemo: (cancer_chemotherapy_drug_name)
Date Chemo completed: (cancer_chemotherapy_completed_date)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_chemotherapy_hospital)
Did you receive Radiation for this Cancer? (cancer_radiation)
Date Radiation completed: (cancer_radiation_completed_date)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_radiation_hospital)
Did you receive Hormonal Therapy for this Cancer? (cancer_hormonal_therapy)
Name of Hormone Therapy: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_drug_name)
Date Hormonal Therapy started: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_started_date)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_hospital)
Did you receive any other type(s) of therapy? (cancer_other_therapy)
Name of Other Therapy: (cancer_other_therapy_name)
Date Other Therapy started: (cancer_other_therapy_started_date)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_other_therapy_hospital)
Have you had a Recurrence with this Cancer? (cancer_recurrence)
Date of Recurrence: (cancer_recurrence_date)
Where did this cancer recur? (ex. lung, breast, liver) (cancer_recurrence_site)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_recurrence_hospital)
If you have been diagnosed with more than one cancer, please complete the following: (cancer_second_intro)
Have you ever had a second cancer? (had_second_cancer)
Cancer Site/Type: (Example: Second Cancer: Breast Cancer) (cancer_site2)
Laterality: (cancer_laterality2)
Date of Diagnosis: (cancer_diagnosis_date2)
Age of Diagnosis: (cancer_diagnosis_age2)
Did you have Surgery for this Cancer? (cancer_surgery2)
Name of Procedure: (cancer_surgery_name2)
Surgery Date: (cancer_surgery_date2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_surgery_hospital2)
Did you receive Chemotherapy for this Cancer? (cancer_chemotherapy2)
Type of Chemo: (cancer_chemotherapy_drug_name2)
Date Chemotherapy started: (cancer_chemotherapy_started_date2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_chemotherapy_hospital2)
Did you receive Radiation for this Cancer? (cancer_radiation2)
Date Radiation started: (cancer_radiation_started_date2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_radiation_hospital2)
Did you receive Hormonal Therapy for this Cancer? (cancer_hormonal_therapy2)
Name of Hormone Therapy: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_drug_name2)
Date Hormonal Therapy started: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_started_date2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_hormonal_therapy_hospital2)
Did you receive any other type(s) of therapy? (cancer_other_therapy2)
Name of Other Therapy: (cancer_other_therapy_name2)
Date Other Therapy started: (cancer_other_therapy_started_date2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_other_therapy_hospital2)
Have you had a Recurrence with this Cancer? (cancer_recurrence2)
Date of Recurrence: (cancer_recurrence_date2)
Where did this cancer recur? (ex. lung, breast, liver) (cancer_recurrence_site2)
Treatment Hospital: (cancer_recurrence_hospital2)

protocol.preferredDefinition: These questions start by asking if the respondent has had cancer. For respondents who have had cancer, detailed follow-up questions ask about the type of cancer treatment, including surgery, chemotherapy, radiation, and hormone therapy.
